tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  instructor_id INT,
  schedule_details VARCHAR(100)
)
CREATE TABLE Courses (course_id INT, course_name VARCHAR(255), course_description TEXT, instructor_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (course_id));
CREATE TABLE Instructors (instructor_id INT, instructor_name VARCHAR(255), instructor_email VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (instructor_id));
CREATE TABLE Schedule (schedule_id INT, course_id INT, instructor_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, schedule_time TIME, PRIMARY KEY (schedule_id));

CREATE TABLE schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  instructor_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  schedule_time TIME
);
